title: Ssalia and the Dragons of Avienot
description: Ssalia, a young snake girl living on the fantastical planet Pelsatia, is not your ordinary child: at twelve years of age, she is already infamous for getting wrapped up in all sorts of adventures. But one fateful summer, her greatest journey is about to start: when she meets a friendly dragon and hears about the hidden dragon city of Avienot, nothing can keep her from searching for it, even if she gets into all sorts of trouble along the way...
author: Tammy Spahn
